title: With the Marksman rework, do you think the marksmen will still have their "classes"?
body:
When Riot reworks their adcs, What Im wondering about most is if some adcs will keep their Hypercarry or Caster statuses. 

{{champion:67}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:96}}  - Still be hyper carries?
{{champion:22}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:110}}  - Still the utility ads?
{{champion:81}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:42}}   - Still be casters/lane bullies?
{{champion:222}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:18}}  -Or still be jacks-of-all trades?
{{champion:51}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:133}}  -And hopefully give these a place

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Summoner Grey,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3G0YJJmE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-02T23:03:21.419+0000)
>
> ... kalista is a utility adc?

Vision + Initiation cc + Lacks damage alot of the heavy-hitting carries have.

Quinn is a good lane bully.
Also you kinda forgot burst ADCs, which overlap a bit with what you have.

Examples: {{champion:104}} {{champion:133}} 

Sivir is good for initiation, putting her in at least the utility group, and Caitlyn is the lane bully of all lane bullies

> [{quoted}](name=Avantel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3G0YJJmE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-02T22:37:12.927+0000)
>
> Quinn is a good lane bully.
> Also you kinda forgot burst ADCs, which overlap a bit with what you have.
> 
> Examples: {{champion:104}} {{champion:133}} 
> 
> Sivir is good for initiation, putting her in at least the utility group, and Caitlyn is the lane bully of all lane bullies

You're definitely right about all of those.

Only reason I didnt group Cait with the other "bullies" is because she doesnt really have a place in the lategame compared to other carries, So I kinda grouped the caster/burst carries together. Lucian and Corki can brust people down pretty fast from what I've seen.

And Sivir IS a utility adc imo, but she lacks... the utility the other carries have. All of them up there can initiate with their cc.

{{champion:85}} - I hope there's some items I can use for him as an ADC.. 

He can be quite handy at bot. he's not too strong but not easy to kill and "What is oom?"  xD 

I have fun taking him bot. 

{{champion:150}}  - also him...  he's fun to go botlane with.... {{champion:201}}  because their's stacks.... stack together.. xD

Well, they should. Most classes have those subclasses already, from lane bully to hyper carry to utility. 

What I'm guessing is that they'll have more marksman items available, instead of having a few powerful items that form most cookie cutter builds.

LEt's hope so, I really like there being subcategories of ADCs
